name: Cave Man Man Cave
description:
In this VR game, you play as a man exploring a new cave home. With your trusty club, you get to break into your new environment to discover what wonderful secrets or treasures could be hiding inside. However, things might not appear as what they seem and it could all be nothing more than a nightmare hidden behind stone. Squeeze and grab to find what crazy new world lurks within this cave.

Matt Lopez - Art and Design
Scott Jonske - Programming and Design
Zach Poje - Producing and Art
Tyler Houston - Art and Design
Alec Chall - Programming
Josh Eckhart - Sound
